revised_title: One-to-One Correspondence Between Static Einstein-Maxwell and Stationary Einstein-Vacuum Space-Times
tldr: The author establishes a one-to-one correspondence between static Einstein-Maxwell and stationary Einstein-vacuum space-times, allowing for a direct transformation between these solutions. This correspondence is achieved by writing the metrics in adapted coordinates and gauges for the two-centre problem and black holes with event horizons. The author demonstrates this method using the example of two extreme Reissner-Nordstrom black holes.
